title: STK Nashville brunch menu includes chicken & waffles and eggs benedict
statement: STK Nashville's brunch menu includes items such as Chicken & Waffles, Biscuits & Gravy, Eggs Benedict, and STK Breakfast Cheeseburger.

citations.quote: Mains: Chicken & Waffles, Biscuits & Gravy, Cheesy Tots, Scrambled Eggs, Bacon & Sausage A La Carte: Oysters, Eggs Benedict, Prime Rib, The Pancake, Avocado Toast, Bagel Lox, Cinnamon French Toast, STK Breakfast Cheeseburger, Steak & Eggs
